title: 3rd sem advice cse
content:
Welp I have pretty much ruined my gpa in first year itself and now I want to hopefully comeback in 3rd sem. (Gpa is low enough that any improvement would be great ,  aiming for an 8 atleast this sem)ðŸ¤¡.


Seniors pls give warnings and advice on what to do/avoid doing.


Pls ðŸ«

comments.body: Bro 1st year is a great time to keep CGPA high. The hardness will increase exponentially as sems go up. But still plan correctly and do enough hard work yes u can improve.

Welp I still got good grades in comp and EPD , improved at math I just did really bad cus of subjects like physics , eee. So I am coping rn saying I am finally done with non cs subjects so I'll improve if I put in the hours.
Does the first year require us to have a grasp of 11th and 12th concepts of Chem and Physics and Maths?
Not much but don't come in with 0 recollection of facts either. For Maths, just remember calculus basics.

I was a student from 2023 batch and I didnt get placed despite that I had 8.15 cgpa ,sorry but anything below 7.5 and u are not getting placed. You guys don't know how much of a struggle it is...and this OP has got less in 1st year itself
